name: io.github.hyperpolymath/poly-db-mcp
title: Polyglot Database MCP
description: Unified MCP server providing access to 20 databases through a single interface. Supports SurrealDB, ArangoDB, Virtuoso SPARQL, CouchDB, Cassandra, Redis/Dragonfly, XTDB, SQLite, Qdrant, Meilisearch, MariaDB, and more.
